Class MedicineReminderManager

java.lang.Object
MedicineReminderManager
public class MedicineReminderManager extends Object
The MedicineReminderManager class manages medicine reminders, including adding, retrieving reminders and specifically due reminders, as well as updating reminders in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MedicineReminderManager()
    Constructs a MedicineReminderManager object with an empty list of reminders.

      Retrieves all reminders associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose reminders are to be retrieved.
      Returns:

      Retrieves reminders that are due for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user for whom due reminders are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of medicine reminders that are due for the specified user.

    • storeReminder

      public boolean storeReminder(MedicineReminder medReminder)
      Stores a medicine reminder in the database.
      Parameters:
      medReminder - The medicine reminder to be stored.
      Returns:
      True if the reminder is successfully stored, false otherwise.

    • updateReminder

      Updates a medicine reminder in the database.
      Parameters:
      medReminder - The medicine reminder to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the reminder is successfully updated, false otherwise.
